VIDEO_DOWNLOAD.DOWNLOAD:
Download FFmpeg binaries?

FFmpeg will be installed in
VIDEO_DOWNLOAD.MISSING:
Viridian needs FFmpeg binaries in order to work.

If you already have FFmpeg installed/downloaded in your system, you can manually configure the binaries directory path in the settings.

In case you don't, you can download the binaries right now.

VIDEO_PLAYER.FILE_ERROR: The file you tried to open doesn't exist.

FILE_MESSAGE.KEYFRAMES:
The opened video file surpasses the limit of keyframes markers to be displayed in the segments/clips section of the video player.

Everything is going to work normally, including keyframes navigation, but keyframes display will be disabled.
FILE_MESSAGE.NOT_VALID: The opened file is not a valid video container.
FILE_MESSAGE.NOT_SUPPORTED:
The opened video file is not natively supported by Electron/Chromium's video player.

A temporary, compatible version of the video can be created to allow its usage in Viridian. All operations will use the original input file as the source. This process could take several minutes.

Note that depending on the container and/or codec, some features (filters, cut/concat, etc.) might not work properly, and output settings could be limited.
FILE_MESSAGE.HEVC:
Your system does not support Electron/Chromium's HEVC video hardware decoding.

A temporary, compatible version of the video can be created to allow its usage in Viridian. All operations will use the original input file as the source. This process could take several minutes.

VIDEO_SAVE.CLIPS_ERROR:
There are no/not enough clips selected for export. Make sure that at least one is selected for each opened file in the segments/clips section.

If you are working with multiple files, you must open them alone, since that feature is meant to be used exclusively to concatenate files.

CONCAT.NAME: F:{{ i }} | Concat Clips
CONCAT.FULL: File ({{ i }}) | Concat All Clips ({{ k }})

SPLIT.NAME: F:{{ i }} > C:{{ k }} | Create S:{{ l }}
SPLIT.FULL: File ({{ i }}) > Clip ({{ k }}) | Create Split ({{ l }})

SAVE.SAVE_ERROR:
An error has occurred during the processing of the video.
Check the log for more details.

SUPPORT.NAME: Support
SUPPORT.TEXT:
Reference:

D..... = Decoding supported
.E.... = Encoding supported
..V... = Video codec
...I.. = Intra frame-only codec
....L. = Lossy compression
.....S = Lossless compression

COMPATIBILITY.LOSSY_CONCAT:
One or more of the files don't share the necessary parameters to use lossless concatenation with the already opened ones, but they were added anyways.

The concatenation filter (lossy) will be used. To be able to use the demuxer (lossless) mode, make sure that all files have the same codec and timebase.
COMPATIBILITY.NO_CONCAT:
One or more of the files don't share the necessary parameters to use concatenation with the already opened ones, and haven't been added to the list.

Make sure that all files have at least the same width and height values (for lossy concatenation), and same codec and timebase preferably (for lossless concatenation).

DOWNLOAD.NAME: Download
DOWNLOAD.TEXT: Get the latest compatible FFmpeg version.

FILES_PATH.NAME: FFmpeg Path
FILES_PATH.TEXT: Select the directory for FFmpeg binaries.

SAVE_COMMANDS.NAME: Save Commands to File
SAVE_COMMANDS.TEXT: Saves the executed FFmpeg commands to a file.

RECENT_FILES.NAME: Show Recent Files List
RECENT_FILES.TEXT: Display the recent opened files list in the startup screen if there are any, storing up to 20 files.

CREATE_THUMBS.NAME: Generate Thumbnails
CREATE_THUMBS.TEXT: Enable video thumbnails generation. This could slow down file load times considerably depending on the length of the video.

KEY_FRAMES.NAME: Show Keyframes
KEY_FRAMES.TEXT: Display keyframe markers in the segments/clips section of the video player.

CLEAR_CACHE.NAME: Clear Cache
CLEAR_CACHE.TEXT: Remove all temporary files created inside the 'temp' folder (thumbnails, text files, etc.).

KEYS.CLIP_SNAP_START_CLIP: Snap Start to Nearest Clip End
KEYS.CLIP_SNAP_END_CLIP: Snap End to Nearest Clip Start

RESTORE.NAME: Restore
RESTORE.TEXT: Restore all settings to default (except hotkeys).
